precondition: The mouse cursor is visible on the Windows XP desktop.
A context menu is open on the desktop.
expected_results: The context menu will close, and the 'Display Properties' window will open.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Appearance" tab is active.
expected_results: The contents of the "Display Properties" window will change to show the "Screen Saver" settings. A new button labeled "Power..." will appear at the bottom of the "Monitor power" section.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the down arrow on the 'Screen saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The dropdown menu will expand, showing a list of available screen savers.

precondition: The 'Screen saver' dropdown menu is expanded.
action: Click on the '(None)' option in the dropdown menu.
expected_results: The selected screen saver in the 'Screen saver' dropdown menu will change to '(None)'.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu within the 'Display Properties' window is open.
action: Click on the 'None' item in the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu will close.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will close and the "Power Options Properties" window will open.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "Power schemes" dropdown menu should be visible.
action: Click the down arrow of the "Power schemes" dropdown menu.
expected_results: A list of available power schemes will appear. You can now select "Always On" from the list.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Always On' power scheme is selected.
action: Click on the 'Keep your computer up to date' dialog box in the bottom left corner of the screen.
expected_results: The 'Keep your computer up to date' dialog box will move to the foreground and become focused.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Always On" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the down arrow of the "Turn off monitor" drop-down menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off monitor", "Turn off hard disks", "System standby", and "System hibernates" drop-down menus will display "After 20 mins". A yellow pop-up window titled "Keep your computer up to date" will appear at the bottom of the screen.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "System hibernates" dropdown menu is expanded.
action: Click the "Never" option within the "System hibernates" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "System hibernates" dropdown menu will close. A system notification titled "Keep your computer up to date" will appear in the bottom right corner of the screen.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Power Schemes' tab is selected. The 'Always On' power scheme is selected, and the dropdowns for 'Turn off monitor', 'Turn off hard disks', 'System standby', and 'System hibernates' are all set to 'Never'.
The 'Power Options Properties' window is open with the 'OK' button highlighted.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will close, leaving the 'Display Properties' window open.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the 'OK' button at the bottom of the window.
